member.name: T:FileHelpers.DataLink.ExcelBadUsageException
member.summary: Indicates the wrong usage of the ExcelStorage of the library.

member.name: M:FileHelpers.DataLink.ExcelBadUsageException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of an ExcelBadUsageException.

member.name: T:FileHelpers.DataLink.ExcelDataLink
member.summary:
This class has the responsability to enable the two directional transformation.
Excel <-> DataStorage
WARNING you need to have installed Microsoft Excel 2000 or newer to use this feature.
To use this class you need to reference the FileHelpers.ExcelStorage.dll file.

remarks.para: Uses an to accomplish this task.

member.name: M:FileHelpers.DataLink.ExcelDataLink.#ctor(FileHelpers.DataLink.DataStorage)
member.summary: Create a new instance of the class.
member.param: The used to performs the transformation.

member.name: M:FileHelpers.DataLink.ExcelDataLink.ExtractToExcel(System.String)
member.summary: Extract records from the data source and insert them to the specified file using the DataLinkProvider method.
member.param: The files where the records be written.
member.returns: True if the operation is successful. False otherwise.

member.name: M:FileHelpers.DataLink.ExcelDataLink.InsertFromExcel(System.String)
member.summary: Extract records from a file and insert them to the data source using the DataLinkProvider method.
member.param: The file with the source records.
member.returns: True if the operation is successful. False otherwise.

member.name: P:FileHelpers.DataLink.ExcelDataLink.ExcelStorage
member.summary: The internal used to the file or stream ops.

member.name: P:FileHelpers.DataLink.ExcelDataLink.DataStorage
member.summary: The internal used to the link ops.

member.name: P:FileHelpers.DataLink.ExcelDataLink.LastExtractedRecords
member.summary: An array of the last records extracted from the data source to a file.

member.name: P:FileHelpers.DataLink.ExcelDataLink.LastInsertedRecords
member.summary: An array of the last records inserted in the data source that comes from a file.

summary.para: This class implements the for Microsoft Excel Files.

para.b: WARNING you need to have installed Microsoft Excel 2000 or newer to use this feature.
To use this class you need to reference the FileHelpers.ExcelStorage.dll file.

remmarks.b: This class is contained in the FileHelpers.ExcelStorage.dll and need the Interop.Office.dll and Interop.Excel.dll to work correctly.

member.summary: Create a new ExcelStorage to work with the specified type

member.summary: Create a new ExcelStorage to work with the specified type
member.param: The row of the first data cell. Begining in 1.
The column of the first data cell. Begining in 1.

member.summary: Create a new ExcelStorage to work with the specified type
member.param: The row of the first data cell. Begining in 1.
The column of the first data cell. Begining in 1.
The file path to work with.
